author: jsdelfino
msg: Helloworldws cannot reuse helloworld.jar because helloworld.jar already contains an sca.module file, to allow this kind of reuse we would have to just place an sca.fragment in helloworld.jar and we won't want to complicate helloworld, so it's just better to keep things simple and not try to reuse helloworld in helloworldws

author: jsdelfino
msg: Fixed typo in Maven group id
